center.title: Basic Example
center.description: Shows you how to render a map the easy-way on our HTML.

center.title: Center  Example
center.description: Positioning the map in a specific location.

center.title: Center Url Hash Example
center.description: Using URL parameters as a center location.

center.title: Center Autodiscover Example
center.description: Shows how to center the map to the client browser location.

center.title: Center Constrain Zoom Example
center.description: Shows how to limit the maximum and minimum zoom allowed in our map.

center.title: Center Bounds Example
center.description: Easily get the bounds of the map inside the center object.

center.title: Custom Parameters  Example
center.description: Changing the default map composing parameters.

center.title: Changing Layers By Demand Example
center.description: Change the active layer setting an object property.

center.title: Changing Layers On Events Response Example
center.description: Change the active layer when a specific event is triggered.

center.title: Changing Layer Opacity Example
center.description: Change the active layer opacity from the DOM.
